name: Wapr
overview:
Professional network for businesses

Wapr helps businesses create new customers. Wapr addresses the following problems faced by every small and medium business.

Difficulty in creating new customers Poor customer experience Finding right talent Unable to measure ROI

Wapr helps companies create their profile, showcase their business to prospects & help increase contacts, receive business leads, Job inquiries. Your Wapr profile is designed to do business where you post your marketing material (videos, podcasts, presentations, pdf’s, docs), products, hiring needs, opportunities, press releases, blogs all on one page for millions of Wapr users to view and buy. You can choose to make people from your company available on profile as well as your website to help your customers.

Wapr does not only help you put your information for people to see, we actually help enhance your customer experience so you can increase visitor to customer conversion rate. Let it be your website, or company profile page once you login you are online to see what your customers are looking for and help them proactively with a chat or call. You can also be online through emails you send to various contacts. Visitors viewing your Job requirements, marketing material, your products, your press releases or your business opportunities can always interact with you through chat or they can simply call you or send you a email ticket from where ever they are.
